text: <@U016TGY3676> Yes you were right, even with everything rounded in excel it was still causing errors.  For example it was getting odds of 1.800000000000001. I've just extracted it from excel into python using round in python on top of the VBA rounding and seems to be working fine for now. I'll go the lookup table route if it fails again, but was easiest option with what I'd already done :crossed_fingers:

elements.text: Yes you were right, even with everything rounded in excel it was still causing errors.  For example it was getting odds of 1.800000000000001. I've just extracted it from excel into python using round in python on top of the VBA rounding and seems to be working fine for now. I'll go the lookup table route if it fails again, but was easiest option with what I'd already done

text: Hi all, does the betfair exchange (UK) display different screens to different accounts for the same horse racing market? I notice when there are horses scratched, my screen for the win market will stop self-refreshing/updating, not displaying BSP prices in the middle, and I can't see any (un)matched bets I have placed on the right hand side of the screen (the yellow area in the below 1st screenshot). Some of the bets were placed 10 or 20 hours before that race starts. I have asked betfair chat several times and they just told me my bets weren't matched (completely missing my point that I can't see any bets, matched or not.

text: A friend sent me his screen (screenshot below) where all matched (or unmatched) bets are visible on the screen. I wonder if any one knows anything or having similar experience?
